actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to make certain positions on the United States Sentencing Commission part time beginning October 1, 1989.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to change the positions of the voting members of the U.S. Sentencing Commission, other than the Chairman's, from full-time to part-time on October 1, 1989. (Current law provides that such positions shall remain full-time until the end of the first six years after the sentencing guidelines go into effect).

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to make certain positions on the United States Sentencing Commission part time beginning October 1, 1989.
